markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wand of Overflowing Life](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3426)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=623" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
<trait label="Vitality" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=509" />
<trait label="Wand" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=731" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 309 <sup>1.1</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This alabaster wand has a clear crystal at the tip.

**Activate** <actions string="" /> Cast a Spell;  **Frequency** once per day, plus overcharge;   **Effect** You cast [_heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1554) at the indicated rank. After you cast the spell, at the start of your next turn, excess healing magic wells up from the wand and heals you, as though you cast the 1-action version of _heal_ on yourself at the same spell rank. You gain this benefit only once per turn, even if you cast multiple _heal_ spells from wands of _overflowing life_ in the same turn.

**Craft Requirements** Supply a casting of [_heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1554) of the appropriate rank.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
